name: Ragusa Republic
description:
Dive into a new adventure trough medieval city of Ragusa based in 17th century which is inspired by interesting and authentic history of Dubrovnik.  Explore this unique Mediterranean environment and discover the lifestyle of his citiznes with following the main character Dundo Maroje, who will guide and entertain you with little task that you need to solve. 

The game is still in development but you can try out our free demo which includes four levels, starting on mountain of Srđ, where our main character lives, trough saving the villagers from wolfs attack, delivering goods into city or searching for items between city walls.

Control Scheme: 

This is a third person game.  The player is taking control over Dundo Maroje with W (forward), S (back), A (left), D (right) keys on the keyboard, and rotates the camera around the main character with the MOUSE. With MOUSE player can kick with hands and legs, or use some of weapons by choice (sword, gun, axe or bow). 
With SPACE key the player jumps, with C player can crouch, with TAB make roll forward and take sprint with CAPS LOCK. 

Player also have choice to ride a horse, mounting with F on keyboard. Riding take place on the same principles as controling main character (walking, running and jumping).  Weapons can be choosed by using 4, 5, and 6 on keyboard, depends on which holster is used.
